description:
* Based on a series of light novels written by http://anidb.net/cr5970 [Nishio Ishin] and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr6436 [Vofan].
http://anidb.net/ch8962 [Araragi Koyomi] is a third year high school student who is almost human again after having briefly become a vampire. One day, a classmate named http://anidb.net/ch8963 [Senjougahara Hitagi], who infamously never talks to anyone, falls down the stairs into Koyomi`s arms. He discovers that Hitagi weighs next to nothing, in defiance of physics and common sense alike. Despite being threatened by her, Koyomi offers her help, and introduces her to http://anidb.net/ch8967 [Oshino Meme], a middle-aged homeless man who helped him stop being a vampire.
Note: Episodes 13-15 (Tsubasa Cat parts 3-5) were not part of the initial TV broadcast and premiered on the anime`s official website.

REGULAR.description:
On the day after the Golden Week holiday, third year high school student Koyomi Araragi finds himself saving a classmate, Hitagi Senjougahara, by catching her when she slips on the stairs and comes tumbling down from above. He discovers that she`s impossibly light, as if she has no physical weight whatsoever….
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ひたぎクラブ 其ノ壹

titles.title: ひたぎクラブ 其ノ貳

REGULAR.description:
Koyomi meets Mayoi Hachikuji, an elementary school girl who is frantically comparing the town map displayed in the park to the memo in her hand. Learning that Mayoi has lost her way en route to a relative`s home, Koyomi offers to help, only to be violently rebuffed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: まよいマイマイ 其ノ壹

titles.title: まよいマイマイ 其ノ參

REGULAR.description:
Suruga Kanbaru, the school’s biggest star who has led the underwhelming girls’ basketball team to the national championships, begins to inexplicably stalk her upperclassman, Koyomi Araragi. When Hitagi Senjyogahara hears about this, she reveals that back in middle school, she was once so close to Suruga that they were known as the "Valhalla Combo."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: するがモンキー 其ノ壹

titles.title: するがモンキー 其ノ參

REGULAR.description:
Meme Oshino has given Koyomi Araragi the task of heading to an abandoned temple on top of a mountain on the outskirts of town, and placing a talisman on the main shrine. Koyomi invites Suruga Kanbaru to accompany him, and the two are on their way up the deserted mountain path towards the shrine, when they pass a young girl running down, her hat pulled low over her head.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: なでこスネイク 其ノ壹

REGULAR.description:
June 13th. The students are busy after class, getting ready for the last School Festival of their high school days, which will be held during the upcoming weekend.
Source: crunchyroll
